00044 #include <glib.h>
00045 #include <time.h>
00046 #include <rtp.h>
00047 
00048 #ifndef _SCHEDULE_H_
00049 #define _SCHEDULE_H_
00050 
00051 typedef struct {
00052     GTree* event_tree;
00053     GMutex* event_tree_mutex;
00054     time_t earliest_event_time;
00055 } schedule_t;
00056 
00057 extern int schedule_init(schedule_t* s);
00058 extern void schedule_destroy(schedule_t* s);
00059 extern void schedule_schedule(schedule_t* s, double *t, rtcp_event_t *e);
00060 extern void schedule_reschedule(schedule_t* s, double t, rtcp_event_t *e);
00061 extern void schedule_print(schedule_t* s);
00062 extern rtcp_event_t* schedule_earliest_event(schedule_t* s, double* k);
00063 
00064 #ifdef _DEBUG
00065 extern int schedule_test();
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #endif
